display_name: Morning Survey (Sleep Heart Health Study Visit Two (SHHS2)): glasses or cans of soda before bed
description: 10. How many of the following drinks with caffeine did you have during the 4 hours before you went to sleep last night? (Please write "0" if you did not drink any of that beverage.)  c. ____ glasses or cans of cola or other soda (with caffeine)
